message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase it. I would like to counteroffer at $120.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer you the product for $135.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counteroffer at $127.
Thank you for your latest counteroffer, Bob! I'm still a bit above your target, but I'm willing to budge a bit more. I'll offer you the product for $130.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort to reach a compromise. I would like to counteroffer at $128.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob! I'm getting close to your target, but I'm still not quite there. I'll offer you the product for $129.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. I would like to counteroffer at $126.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob! I'm really close to your target, and I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer you the product for $128.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to reach a fair price. I would like to counteroffer at $127.
